title: SeedChecker
author: SeedChecker
created_time: March 09, 2023, 02:18:19 PMLast edit: March 09, 2023, 05:51:02 PM by SeedChecker

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: So you sell software in which someone should enter their seed words so that they can then monitor the balance on their coin addresses with the help of your software? Well, that backup should be something that we don't share with anyone, let alone that we should share it with random software, regardless of whether it is open source or not.If someone wants to monitor the status of their coin addresses, there are much simpler and free ways, not to mention the security and privacy that your software completely undermines.Do not share your SEED words with anyone!

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 02:18:19 PM]- By using the SeedChecker software, you confirm thall seed phrases used on your part belong only to you.Wait, you are asking me to give you the seed and also pay for the subscription?Nice scam!

comments.author: SeedChecker
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on March 09, 2023, 04:05:10 PMSo you sell software in which someone should enter their seed words so that they can then monitor the balance on their coin addresses with the help of your software? Well, that backup should be something that we don't share with anyone, let alone that we should share it with random software, regardless of whether it is open source or not.If someone wants to monitor the status of their coin addresses, there are much simpler and free ways, not to mention the security and privacy that your software completely undermines.Do not share your SEED words with anyone!Our software will be useful for you only if you have a large base of Seed phrases (from 500 pieces and more). Our software does not make sense to work with 1-2 Seed phrases.

comments.author: dragonvslinux
comments.body: Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 02:18:19 PMwe are movedOver to here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444148.0
